title: A Personal search
other_title: A Personal search: for the complementarity of music and visual art
abstract: Computer animation pioneer John Whitney chronicles his search for the complentarity of music and visual art
description: In this autobiographical documentary, John Whitney, one of the best-known film and computer artists of our time, reflects on and explores his lifelong search for the complentarity of music and visual art, and the synthesis of film and computer technologies. In doing so, he describes current developments that foretell radical and exciting new ways viewers will soon be experiencing music and art.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000298; John Whitney compilation; Active; 1966-1992
